byooption.longDescription: These Ferric Grey 20 inch wheels are simple and understated, yet still draw attention!  Driving over rough or damaged road surfaces, as well as debris, curbs and other obstacles can cause serious damage to wheels, tires and suspension parts. This is more likely to occur with low-profile tires, which provide less cushioning between the wheel and the road. Be careful to avoid road hazards and reduce your speed, especially if your vehicle is equipped with low-profile tires.
byooption.name: BMW Double Spoke 361 Wheel and Tire Set - Ferric Grey

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.longDescription: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. It provides a secure way to utilize these devices while in the rear seat of your BMW. This product is used in conjunction with our sturdy base carrier, which utilizes a modular plug connector. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats. Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.name: BMW iPad Holder

byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW 320i Sedan models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $359 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $32,321 (MSRP of $36,095, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $2,750 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $1,024).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $2,750 down payment, $359 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $22,379.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
byooption.name: Navigation system

options.description: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
options.name: Navigation system

byooption.longDescription: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.
byooption.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot

It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
byooption.name: Navigation system

conflictAddOptions.description: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
conflictAddOptions.name: Navigation system

options.description: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.
options.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot

byooption.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
byooption.longDescription: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.

byooption.longDescription: The 6-speed manual transmission delivers a precise, athletic feel.  Its responsiveness is due, in part, to the enhanced synchronization of shifts from neutral to each gear.  A shortened shift lever and "throw" add to the sporty feel of the gearbox.  The sixth gear drops revs at highway speeds for smooth cruising.
byooption.name: Manual Transmission

options.description: The 6-speed manual transmission delivers a precise, athletic feel.  Its responsiveness is due, in part, to the enhanced synchronization of shifts from neutral to each gear.  A shortened shift lever and "throw" add to the sporty feel of the gearbox.  The sixth gear drops revs at highway speeds for smooth cruising.

byooption.longDescription: Winter driving fun should not go down with the thermometer. The Cold Weather Package adds three heat settings to the front seats and welcome warmth to the steering wheel, while keeping the headlights clear to illuminate the road ahead in bad weather.
byooption.name: Cold Weather Package

packages.description: Winter driving fun should not go down with the thermometer. The Cold Weather Package adds three heat settings to the front seats and welcome warmth to the steering wheel, while keeping the headlights clear to illuminate the road ahead in bad weather.
packages.name: Cold Weather Package

byooption.longDescription: A welcome cool-weather feature for left and right rear-seat occupants. With the touch of a button, passengers can individually select their preferred level of warmth.
byooption.name: Heated rear seats

byooption.longDescription: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.

byooption.longDescription: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; using ultrasonic sensors in front and rear bumpers helps judge distance to other vehicles and objects.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Package

packages.description: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; using ultrasonic sensors in front and rear bumpers helps judge distance to other vehicles and objects.
packages.name: Driving Assistance Package

byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
byooption.name: Park Distance Control

options.description: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
options.name: Park Distance Control

byooption.longDescription: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.
byooption.name: Rear view camera

options.description: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.

byooption.longDescription: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Bright LED headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend. For added convenience, high beams can also be automatically turned on and off, as needed.

Topping it all off: the daily convenience of Comfort Access.

byooption.disclaimer: SiriusXM services require a subscription after trial period. If you decide to continue your service at the end of your trial subscription, the plan you choose will automatically renew and bill at then-current  rates until you call 1-866-635-2349 to cancel. See SiriusXM Customer Agreement for complete terms at siriusxm.com.
byooption.longDescription: SiriusXM-equipped BMWs come with a 1-year trial to the Sirius All Access package.  You'll hear every SiriusXM channel available in your BMW, including commercial-free music, plus all your favorite sports, exclusive talk, entertainment and all of our premium programming.  Plus you'll get SiriusXM Internet Radio, so you can bring SiriusXM with you wherever you go - on your computer, smartphone and tablet.  Welcome to the world of SiriusXM.

byooption.longDescription: Combines enhanced steering, suspension and brakes together with specifically designed non run-flat Michelin Pilot Super Sport performance tires for handling winding roads.  These features provide added agility in tight curves, greater braking performance, as well as great flexibility while maneuvering at low speeds. Depending on your driving style and driving conditions, Michelin Pilot Super Sport (PSS)  performance tires may wear faster and may be more costly to replace than non-performance tires of the same size.  For more information, please refer to the tire manufacturer’s warranty manual provided with your vehicle.
